title: Set up uv workflow

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added pyproject.toml and uv.lock, documented uv usage in AGENTS.md, installed FastAPI/uvicorn/pydantic via uv.

title: Skills management UI
description: Add UI to list/create/update/delete skills and enable/disable per project.

title: Add basic local file ingestion copy
description: When dataset source is a local file path, copy it into projects/<id>/data/raw during dataset creation.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Dataset creation now copies local file sources into projects/<id>/data/raw; returns 400 when the file is missing.

title: Scaffold project structure and API skeleton

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Scaffolded initial repo structure with API routes/services/models, added in-memory store and minimal docs placeholders.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added project workspace provisioning and artifact listing endpoint; API now supports GET /projects/{project_id}/artifacts with optional run_id filter.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Implemented replanning context in generate_plan, added auto-run loop with run log summarization, and updated test mock signature.

title: Implement snapshot/rollback storage

title: Add dataset upload endpoint
description: Support POST /projects/{id}/datasets/upload with multipart file and persist into data/raw.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added /projects/{id}/datasets/upload endpoint and file persistence into data/raw.

title: Persist projects/datasets/runs with SQLModel
description: Replace in-memory store with SQLite persistence using SQLModel; initialize db on startup.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added SQLModel models and SQLite-backed store; init_db runs on startup.

title: Extend e2e eval with chat
description: Add chat-based evaluation to e2e agent script with retries, approvals, and markdown report output.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Updated scripts/e2e_agent_eval.py to evaluate chat interface: generate script via chat, apply approvals, run chat script, and write markdown report. Added retry prompt for invalid plans. E2E run: uv run python scripts/e2e_agent_eval.py (pass).

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added Pydantic AI dependency and integrated a Pydantic AI chat backend with new generic tools (list_dir/read_file/grep/append/replace/run_shell). Extended tool catalog + router to include new tools and added Pydantic AI run logging.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Tests: uv run pytest apps/api/tests/test_api.py -q

title: Improve LLM JSON handling for agent chat

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Hardened LLM plan generation with response_format JSON, fallback parsing, and clearer errors.

title: Fix autonomy eval approvals and paths
description: Allow destructive tools when steps do not require approval, and tighten autonomy eval prompt to use explicit workspace path.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Fixed ToolRouter approval flow by allowing destructive tools when step does not require approval, and tightened autonomy eval prompt to use explicit workspace path. Autonomy eval now passes.

title: Implement agent chat API + UI wiring

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Implemented agent chat API + UI wiring: added chat message model/schema, list/send endpoints, prompt-to-plan helper, UI send flow + history load, tests.

title: Add replanning context and autonomy eval
description: Enhance replanning context summaries, enforce network policy for run_shell, and add an autonomy E2E evaluation script covering list_dir/read_file/write_file/run_python.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added compact replanning context, enforced no-network shell execution, and created scripts/e2e_agent_autonomy_eval.py to exercise list_dir/read_file/write_file/run_python in chat.

title: Provision per-project workspace folders
description: Create project directory structure (data/raw, data/staging, data/processed, scripts, artifacts, metadata, secrets, env) on project creation.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Project creation now provisions per-project workspace folders under projects/<id> with data/, scripts/, artifacts/, metadata/, secrets/, env/.

title: Support OpenAI Responses API models
description: Allow Pydantic AI backend to use responses-only models via env configuration.
